system.special: Daemon Wep, Felling (2), Spray, Warp Weapon
system.note:
Weapon: Spear. Daemon WP 60 (Khorne Daemon), Bind Str 3. Att.: Howling, Piercing. Needs Two hands, can make [Melee] Attack.
Gain Fear(+1) When attacking, Add Daemon's WP to Critical Damage.
